nonzero_pole_indices, shape_functions = an.shape_functions(degree=2, order=
    2, knots=[1, 1, 3, 3], weights=[1, 1.5, 1], t=2)
assert_array_almost_equal(nonzero_pole_indices, [0, 1, 2])
assert_array_almost_equal(shape_functions, [[0.2, 0.6, 0.2], [-0.4, 0.0, 
    0.4], [0.48, -0.96, 0.48]])
staticmethod
